value: Shalom Shalom second day the ninth month
fifth day of the week Thursday morning
and time to do Torah rule number 11 you
shall not bear false witness against
your neighbor okay so no false
accusations you're not supposed to lie
about your neighbor for a selfish reason
now it is ok to do righteous lies for
example Corrie ten Boom she was hiding
the Jews from the Nazis the Nazis would
come into her house and say are there
any Jews in your house and she would say
no that was a righteous life that's fine
Rahab the harlot she lied to hide the
two spies so there's there there are
righteous lies that you can use to
protect and preserve life however you
are never to bear false witness never
bear false witness against your neighbor
this is a selfish wicked thing that
you're not to do a lot of people bear
false witness against me know how to
keep people out there that bear false
witness against me you're going to go to
lake of fire so do not bear false
witness this is very important if you
want to survive the coming tribulation
this is daniel john lee with tour
restoration ministries this is tour rule
number 11 Shalom
